src.MusicPlay

类 SoundControlUnits

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.MusicPlay.SoundControlUnits

  • public class SoundControlUnits
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates some methods to controls the background music and the game sound effect. The sound effects include mouse click, mouse hover, car move, and win bgm The background music include start menu bgm, thank you bgm, and the 4 level bgms.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    作者:
    Bai Yunpeng

      This method play the game sound effect of "move the car"
